nodes.text: Evonnus was a Twi'lek male who served as a light armor vendor in the Galactic Republic during the Cold War. He carried a blaster pistol and wore a green uniform.

Evonnus appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Quesh. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Evonnus was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
